attributes.additional_details:
Somerset NEEDS just One council.
We need to get rid of wasteful district councils like Mendip ect,Who even run a VERY COSTLY housing dept with NO HOUSING STOCK..
The one good thing is local council information points in local town libraries,which MUST be retained.
Millions can be saved.
Wiltshire a neighbouring authority are even INVESTING in services now they are just One council.
The waste of district councils is for all to see.
